column4: Requirement
I've come in because I need to top up the Sim card for my old phone. I'm on my lunch break so don't have long.
I would like to upgrade my current plan as I run out of data every month.
I need a phone I can have handy for emergency situations.
My husband asked me to come in and look for a plan that will take care of our home and mobile needs.
I just purchased this smart pad and want to hook it up with my mobile plan.
my husband and I operate our own business from home.  We need a package which will allow us to stay on top of our workload and customer calls regardless of where we are.
I am wanting to connect all my devices onto one plan.
I am just browsing, keen to see what's available these days.
I am just having a look at the best deals around.
I need some help to find something I can use for talking to my daughter on the internet but not sure what that is?
my friends and I were chatting over a game of golf about their new data plans and all the things they are able to do.  I would like to do the same.
I just received some money for my birthday and want to get the latest smart phone.
I need to get a data plan for my smart pad so I can use it at school and for homework.
I am wanting to get my first mobile.
I am wanting to upgrade my mobile package which will include good roaming options.
I am over my current provider and need telco to actually do what they promise.
What can Vodafone offer in terms of high data usage?
I need to work smarter on the road and manage my customers more efficiently.
Many of my customers are overseas and I need a plan that doesn't cost the earth.
I need to modernise my business communications.
I am looking for the best deal on offer for pre-pay on smart phones.
I see you have some new deals in the market, I'd like to hear more.
I want a phone handy to make calls to ask the wife questions from time to time.
I'm out fishing quite a bit with my mates, and would like to use the phone to get data on weather, good fishing spots, etc.  Can Vodafone do that?
I need to pay my bill.
I just need a pre pay top up please.
I'm looking for a plan which will give me heaps of data so I can check in on my friends and keep up to date on what's happening around the city.

column10: Service Area - Vodafone services, products and stories
Uncluttered windows & eye-catching displays invite & entice customers in
Clear browsing zone allows customers to play and discover
Points throughout the store for helping customers - associated with a Store Advisor
Iconic Tech area providing advice, set-up & support
